metadata.title: CVE-2020-15984 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Omnibox in Google Chrome on iOS prior to86.0.4240.75 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox(URL bar) via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
